SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, p.project_price FROM phone_project_relation ppr JOIN phone ph ON ppr.phone_id = ph.phone_id LEFT JOIN project p ON ppr.project_id = p.project_id WHERE ph.phone_number = #{phoneNumber}

select p.phone_id, p.phone_number, p.usage_status, p.registration_time, p.money, r.region_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pj.project_name) as project_name, au.nick_name as admin_nick_name, au.user_avatar as admin_avatar from phone p join region r on p.region_id = r.region_id join admin_users au on p.admin_user_id = au.user_id join phone_project_relation ppr on p.phone_id = ppr.phone_id join project pj on ppr.project_id = pj.project_id group by p.phone_id, p.phone_number, p.usage_status, p.registration_time, p.money, r.region_name, au.nick_name, au.user_avatar
